```{r message=FALSE}
library("knitr")
library("toxbox")
```

Use the rat pup data from package `WWGbook` and reorder the `treatment` factor:

```{r}
library("WWGbook")
data(ratpup)
ratpup$treatment <- factor(ratpup$treatment, levels=c("Control", "Low", "High"))
```

xxx

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=5}
boxclust(data=ratpup, outcome="weight", treatment="treatment", cluster="litter", covariate="sex",
         xlabel="", ylabel="Pup weight [g]\n", psize=1.5, hjitter=0.01, pneg=c(0.033, 0.44), white=TRUE)
```


```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=5}
boxclust(data=ratpup, outcome="weight", treatment="treatment", cluster="litter", covariate="sex",
         xlabel="", ylabel="Pup weight [g]\n", psize=1.5, hjitter=0.01, pneg=0.07, ppos=0.004, white=TRUE)
```
